socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: qualitative description of dietary and plasmapheresis treatment burden

socioeconomic_analysis.justification: No peer-reviewed cost-of-illness studies specific to Refsum disease were found; only patient organization registry cost estimates and qualitative treatment burden descriptions are available, supporting a score of 5.
